CustomField.description: CC BWRD Competitive Advantage Weighted Score Auto
CustomField.formula: CASE( Competitive_Advantage__c, '(1) Low Advantage', 1 * Competitive_Advantage_Weight__c, '(2) Somewhat Low Advantage', 2 * Competitive_Advantage_Weight__c, '(3) Medium Advantage', 3 * Competitive_Advantage_Weight__c, '(4) Somewhat High Advantage', 4 * Competitive_Advantage_Weight__c, '(5) High Advantage', 5 * Competitive_Advantage_Weight__c, 0)
CustomField.label: Competitive Adv for Buyer Weighted Score
